Justifications.VariableNaming: As variáveis têm nomes claros e significativos.
Justifications.FunctionSizes: As funções não são muito grandes, mas podem ser divididas em partes menores para melhorar a coesão.
Justifications.NoNeedsComments: Existem comentários desnecessários que podem ser removidos.
Justifications.MethodCohesion: As classes e métodos têm uma responsabilidade única e estão bem organizados.
Justifications.DeadCode: Há código morto na função UpdateOverallNote, que pode ser eliminado.

Suggestions.Title: Remove unnecessary dead code
Suggestions.Description: The method `UpdateOverallNote` recalculates the overall rating and updates the property, which is redundant since the rating is already calculated in `CalculateOverallRating`. The property should be initialized directly with the rating value.

Suggestions.Title: Add documentation to `OverallNote` property
Suggestions.Description: The `OverallNote` property lacks any documentation, which makes it unclear what the purpose and expected value of this property are. Adding a summary comment explaining its role would improve code readability.

Suggestions.Title: Refactor `CalculateOverallRating` to return a default value if null
Suggestions.Description: The current implementation of `CalculateOverallRating` returns `null`, which is then handled in the property initialization. Instead, it would be more idiomatic to return a default value directly from the method to avoid unnecessary null checks.
